### **About me**

Economist at the <a href="https://uniandes.edu.co/">Universidad de los Andes</a>, trilingual (English, Spanish, and Italian). Interested in Data Analytics, BI, and Macroeconomics. Experience in data analytics, data extraction (web scraping), data cleansing, automation, and process optimization. Knowledge of statistical and econometric models. I handle the Office suite, advanced Excel, and Big Data with <a href="https://www.r-project.org/">R</a>, <a href="https://www.python.org/">Python</a>, <a href="https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/SQL">SQL</a>, <a href="https://www.microsoft.com/es-es/power-platform/products/power-bi">Power BI</a>, <a href="https://www.arcgis.com/index.html">ArcGIS</a>, and <a href="https://about.appsheet.com/home/">Google AppSheet</a>. Results-oriented professional, with analytical thinking, teamwork, problem-solving, strategic planning, and effective communication.

Always open to new challenges and professional projects.

### **Research interests**
My primary interests are Macroeconomics, International Economics, and Monetary Policy. I am also interested in Statistical Programming, Machine Learning, Data Analytics, Big Data, and Applied Mathematics.

<br>

You can find my <a href="https://philipramirezp.github.io/cv/CV_PhilipRamirez.pdf">CV here</a>.
